items.title: Process Visualization (Level 3)
items.headline: Learn HMI / SCADA hands-on by developing your own live interfaces for a running system.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be able to create HMI / SCADA interfaces using various technologies allowing operators to interact with a live, running system.

Using the provided PLC program as the basis for our interfaces, you'll be creating fully-functional graphical interfaces to monitor the process, visualize alarms, provide control and even log periodic and on-demand data storing it into a SQL database.

items.title: Learn VHDL and FPGA Development
items.headline: Learn how to create a VHDL design that can be simulated and implemented on a Xilinx or Altera FPGA development board.
objectives_summary: Understand the design process for implementing a digital design onto a FPGA
Learn how to simulate a design in Altera’s ModelSim and Xilinx Isim
Learn how to use Xilinx ISE tool to program FPGA

items.title: 2021 Ultimate Guide to Raspberry Pi : Tips, Tricks and Hacks

visible_instructors.title: Lee Assam
visible_instructors.name: Lee
visible_instructors.job_title: Electrical and Software Engineer, University Instructor

items.headline: Master the Raspberry Pi 4, Work with Python, GPIO pins and sensors, the Pi Camera Module, build an Amazon Echo Clone!
objectives_summary: Understand what the Raspberry Pi is and how to set it up
Understand the process of installing any OS for the Raspberry Pi
Understand how to connect remotely to your Raspberry Pi and run it in headless mode

items.title: Basic electronics for Arduino Makers

visible_instructors.title: Dr. Peter Dalmaris
visible_instructors.name: Dr. Peter
visible_instructors.job_title: Educator and Author of "Maker Education Revolution".

items.headline: An introduction to electronics to help you make the most from your Arduino or other prototyping platform.
objectives_summary: Understand the concepts of voltage, resistance and current
Use Ohm's Law to calculate voltage, current and resistance
Use Kirchhoff's Laws to calculate voltage and current

items.title: The Complete Basic Electricity & Electronics Course
items.headline: Learn how Electricity, Electronic Components and Circuits work. Join over 5,000 happy students!
objectives_summary: Understand the concept of electric Voltage and Current
Understand how the most important electronic components work
Analyze and design basic electronic circuit

items.title: PID Control with Arduino
items.headline: Learn to implement the widely used industrial controller on the Arduino platform! (For students, makers, and engineers)
objectives_summary: Students will gain an intuitive insight into how a PID controller works and how to implement it on the Arduino Platform!
Use the PID algorithm for their Arduino or microcontroller-based projects such as quad-copters, self balancing robots, temperature control, motor speed control, and much more!

items.title: Mainframe : The Complete TSO/ISPF from Beginner to Expert

visible_instructors.title: Sandeep Kumar
visible_instructors.name: Sandeep
visible_instructors.job_title: Founder of a Training company. IT Consultant, Coach, Mentor

items.headline: Best TSO/ISPF Course. TSO and ISPF commands are explained in detail. Simplified COBOL covered as bonus along with JCL.
objectives_summary: Master the TSO/ISPF commands on Mainframe to excel in your work and project
Students will be able to create basic COBOL program and JCL and perform all TSO/ISPF operations in them.
Perform all the major TSO/ISPF operations and line commands on COBOL Program

objectives_summary: Setup the minimal Raspbian Lite operating system to the RPi.
Learn how to work in headless mode
Learn to install and use the a Python virtual environment.

Use LCD, OLED and TFT screens with buttons and touch interfacese

Monitor and Control PLC operations

items.title: Risk Management: Master FMEA/FMECA & Criticality from A to Z
items.headline: Become an expert in Risk Analysis and Management by applying the most widely used and accepted methodology: FMEA/FMECA
objectives_summary: Perform the FMEA/FMECA analysis on products and design/production processes.
Understand the meaning of criticality analysis.
Perform qualitative, semi-quantitative and quantitative criticality analysis.
